feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries and local snow squalls beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm along the lakeshore. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
